item.title: Tracking Digital Traces(self)
item.description: Contribs Extension: [2019] Add queue sizes to the INFO stats on faktory pull#197 Needed a feature, sneaked into codaebase, found it easy, added changes, test and made a PR ðŸ˜… Learn about faktory, learnt to write tests :) in golang Issue: [2015] Memory check in % rather than fixed value issue#11 Needed a feature, asked for it, nobody cared, so made it and shared it ðŸ˜…
